title: Welcome to react using react-i18next OLL DESIGN

description.part1: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.
description.part2: Switch language between english and german using buttons above.

gallery_groups.badge_hover: グラフィックデザイン

desc.address: ▼Store Production (Domestic & International)|Store design and supervision|Store planning and production|Property introduction, investigation, and sales forecasting|Store renovations and new business development|Consulting for overseas store openings|Production and sales of imported overseas goods (furniture, fixtures, kitchen equipment, etc.)||▼Graphic Design|Logo and web design|Print design (flyers, business cards, menus, etc.) to printing||▼Original Goods Planning, Creation, and Sales|Amusement prizes|Apparel, stationery, miscellaneous goods
Shanghai Onishi Group Architectural Design Consulting Co., Ltd.|No. 2 Warehouse, 1098 Jiangyang South Road, Baoshan District, Shanghai

desc.business: 出店プロデュース（国内・海外対応）

sub_business.name: 店舗企画・店舗設計・設計監理
物件紹介・売上げ予測
店舗改装・新業態開発
国内・海外出店コンサルティング
海外輸入品制作・販売（家具・什器・厨房等

desc.business: グラフィックデザイン

sub_business.name: 紙面デザイン（チラシ・名刺・メニュー等）～印刷
ウェブデザイン・ホームページ作成

desc.business: イベント企画・イベントプロデュース

sub_business.name: 音響設備レンタル・音響スタッフ派遣
オリジナルグッズ作成・販売（Tシャツ・ユニフォ−ム等）

business.header: We build stores that sell.|||It's what we do.
business.desc: OLLDESIGN is a store design company.|||Utilizing chain store theories studied in the United States, we aim to create successful stores across various business types. Once a client secures a property, we develop the blueprints and design, supporting the process up to the store's opening.||||||We also offer marketing consulting, handling operations when customers visit the store. For example, we discuss specifics like the ideal product delivery speed and layout when serving multiple customers. Our detailed consulting approach means projects typically take six months to a year to complete.||||||Rather than focusing solely on aesthetic design, our priority is creating stores that consistently generate sales. We strive to build efficient stores that delight customers

business.header: Design based on numerical evidence from IE (industrial engineering)
business.desc: A scientific method that quantifies every problem and event, logically improving and reforming them.||||||Believing that competitors are not limited to domestic ones, we conduct store comparisons worldwide. Through this process, we have developed unique expertise, information, and knowledge that make us strong in chain stores.

business.header: Strategic design tailored to store objectives and conditions
business.desc: We propose a comprehensive review and standardization of your store opening process to maximize cost savings and profitability. Our approach goes beyond just reducing opening costs. We focus on shortening construction timelines (boosting sales by opening sooner), optimizing workflow plans (reducing labor costs), and creating highly appealing and strategically located store designs (increasing customer traffic).
select_2: Extensive expertise in chain store design.
Store openings in Japan and overseas, with consulting in Asia.
